name: Super Space Rocks
description:
I created this game over the weekend as an entry into the 2022 GameDev.TV Game Jam.
The GitHub Repo I created is publicly available and you're welcome to clone and give it your own personal remix.

(I'm also happy to give tips if needed, leave a comment and I'll reply ASAP!)

Personally "Asteroids" used to be one of my favorite old school games and I drew inspiration from it to create this quick, fun, space shooter ... with my own personal twist.

For everyone outside the GameJam, let me know what you think, and if you enjoyed it, please consider donating to my other project Super Space Pirate  or share my game to help support my work.

This game was created with Game Maker Studio 2 using GML.
